Load data and input number of overlaps / nonoverlaps into a df
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

# Read observed counts and total motifs
moa_overlap   <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/moa/motifs_moa_overlap.bed") %>% nrow()
atac_overlap  <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/atac/motifs_atac_overlap.bed") %>% nrow()
cns_overlap   <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/cns/motifs_cns_overlap.bed") %>% nrow()
all_motifs    <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/maize_ref/B73_500up_motifs.bed") %>% nrow()

# Create data frame for observed percentages
observed <- data.frame(
  Category = c("MOA-seq", "scATAC-seq", "CNS"),
  perc     = c(moa_overlap, atac_overlap, cns_overlap) / all_motifs * 100,
  Type     = "Observed"
)

# Read null counts and compute mean null percentages for each feature
moa_null   <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/moa/null_overlap/null_overlap_counts.txt", header = TRUE)
mean_moa   <- mean(moa_null$OverlapCount) / all_motifs * 100

atac_null  <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/atac/null_overlap/null_overlap_counts.txt", header = TRUE)
mean_atac  <- mean(atac_null$OverlapCount) / all_motifs * 100

cns_null   <- read.table("/workdir/coh22/andro_tfbs/output/feature_overlap/cns/null_overlap/null_overlap_counts.txt", header = TRUE)
mean_cns   <- mean(cns_null$OverlapCount) / all_motifs * 100

null_data <- data.frame(
  Category = c("MOA-seq", "scATAC-seq", "CNS"),
  perc     = c(mean_moa, mean_atac, mean_cns),
  Type     = "Null"
)

# Combine observed and null data
plot_data <- rbind(observed, null_data)
# Set Category factor order so that after coord_flip the order is as desired
plot_data$Category <- factor(plot_data$Category, levels = c("CNS", "scATAC-seq", "MOA-seq"))
plot_data$Type     <- factor(plot_data$Type, levels = c("Observed", "Null"))

# Create a helper variable for fill: for observed, use the feature name; for null, use "Null"
plot_data <- plot_data %>%
  mutate(Fill = ifelse(Type == "Observed", as.character(Category), "Null"))

# Plot the paired bars with position_dodge for grouping
ggplot(plot_data, aes(x = Category, y = perc, fill = Fill, group = Type)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = position_dodge(width = 0.9)) +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format(scale = 1)) +
  # Set colors: observed bars inherit a feature-specific color; null bars in gray
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("MOA-seq"   = "#F8766D", 
                               "scATAC-seq"= "#7CAE00", 
                               "CNS"       = "#00BFC4", 
                               "Null"      = "gray")) +
  labs(
    title = "Overlap of maize motifs with known cis-regulatory features",
    x     = "",
    y     = "Percent of maize motif instances overlapping"
  ) +
  geom_text(aes(label = sprintf("%.1f%%", perc)),
            position = position_dodge(width = 0.9),
            hjust = -0.2, size = 5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ylim(0, 100) +
  guides(fill = "none")

```
